## Why TypeScript?

TypeScript adds **static typing** to JavaScript, catching errors at compile time
rather than runtime. This guide walks you through the basics.

### Setting Up

First, install TypeScript globally:

```bash
npm install -g typescript
```

### Your First Type

```typescript
function greet(name: string): string {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}
```

TypeScript makes refactoring safer and improves developer experience with
better autocomplete and documentation.

### Next Steps

- Read the [TypeScript Handbook](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/)
- Try converting a small JavaScript project
- Explore strict mode for maximum safety
